name: Pixel Ninja Calico #9
description: AI-generated pixel ninja cat. A Legendary Calico ninja with Sai skills.

backstory.name: Shadow Master
backstory.origin: Born during a rare triple-fork event, this Calico ninja was blessed with a multi-colored coat that marks the most elusive of digital guardians. Calico ninjas bring prosperity to their allies and confusion to their enemies.
backstory.training: Under the guidance of the Grand Masters, Shadow Master spent years mastering the Lightning techniques, achieving the rank of Legendary after passing the Trial of Shadow.
backstory.currentRole: Now a Legendary ninja, Shadow Master specializes in the Shadow stance while wielding a Sai, channeling the power of Lightning to secure the blockchain against those who would disrupt its harmony.

special_abilities: Fork Defense - Expert at detecting and neutralizing hard fork attempts
Hash Acceleration - Dramatically speeds up mining and validation processes
Dark Web Navigation - Expert at tracking threats to their source
